definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be abashed, ashamed (Targum [[חֲפַר]] Pr 13:5, [[מַחְפְּרָנׇא]] one causing shame Pr 19:26; Syr. h.par, esp. Aph. be ashamed, put to shame; Ar. xafara be bashful, xafirun shy, bashful; Eth. xafara: be ashamed, blush)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[חָֽפְרָה]] Je 50:12; [[וְחָֽפְרָה]] consec. Is 24:23; [[וְחָפֵָרָה]] Je 15:9; [[חָֽפְרוּ]] Ps 71:24; [[וְחָֽפְרוּ]] consec. Mic 3:7; Impf. [[יַחְפְּרוּ]] Ps 35:4 + 4 t.; [[יֶחְפָָּרוּ]] Ps 34:6; [[וַיֶּחְפָָּרוּ]] Job 6:20; [[תַּחְפְּרוּ]] Is 1:29; —be abashed, ashamed, said of face Ps 34:6 (avoided by looking to ´[[י]]); elsewhere always ‖[[בּוֹשׁ]], of enemies of righteousness Ps 71:24, Ps 35:4, Ps 35:26, Ps 40:15 = Ps 70:3, Ps 83:18; of idolaters Is 1:29; diviners Mic 3:7; of distressed Jerusalem Je 15:9; so of Babylon Je 50:12; of moon Is 24:33; be put to shame (disappointment), of caravans looking for water Job 6:20.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֶחְפִּיר]] Is 33:9; Impf. [[יַחְפִּיר]] Pr 13:5; [[תַּחְפִּ֫ירִי]] Is 54:4; Pt. [[מַחְפִּיר]] Pr 19:26; —display shame, fig. of Lebanon Is 33:9 (‖[[קָמַָל]] ‘ dried up ’ Che); of Israel is Is 54:4 (‖[[בּוֹשׁ]] Qal); of an unfilial son, cause shame Pr 19:26 (‖[[מֵבִישׁ]]); cf. Pr 13:5 of wicked (‖[[יבאישׁ]]: v. [[באשׁ]]
